  var STRINGS = {
    className: 'string',
    begin: '"|\\|',
    end: '"|$',
    contains: [{
      begin: '""'
    }]
  }; // number : даты

  var DATE = {
    begin: "'",
    end: "'",
    excludeBegin: true,
    excludeEnd: true,
    contains: [{
      className: 'number',
      begin: '\\d{4}([\\.\\\\/:-]?\\d{2}){0,5}'

  }; // comment : комментарии

    contains: [COMMENTS]

  };
  return {
